tool_description: A Public API to access data generated by ISBIN in Bairro Alto
title: ISBIN-BA-API

api_list.name: Sign in
api_list.description: Sign in and retrieve the auth token

api_list.name: Get location count
api_list.description: The endpoint will return the number of entries for a specific location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://isbin-ba-api.p.rapidapi.com/count"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "isbin-ba-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sign in
api_list.description: Sign in and retrieve the auth token
